title: Lakshmi Kantha Haaram Set: A Diamond & Pearl Symphony
materials: set with Sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) diamonds and Freshwater Pearls. The central stone is a synthetic Ruby. The set has a subtle Hyderabadi polish for a timeless look.
features: This exquisite set blends tradition with modern aesthetics. The necklace features a delicate floral design with CZ diamond clusters, interspersed with lustrous freshwater pearl drops. The central pendant is a traditional South Indian motif, adorned with CZ diamonds and highlighted by a rich synthetic ruby. The accompanying earrings are intricately designed Jhumkas, mirroring the necklace's floral pattern and culminating in a single pearl drop.
colors: The color palette is a classic combination of gold
red (from the ruby) and soft ivory (from the pearls). This creates a regal yet understated look.
occasions: or any grand occasion where you want to exude elegance. Also suitable for modern events and parties.
description: This set offers a captivating blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary style. The meticulous craftsmanship, combined with high-quality materials, ensures lasting beauty and a comfortable wear. It's a statement piece that adds a touch of regal grace to any outfit and makes a wonderful heirloom for generations to come.
